## Pull Request

**Description**
Brief description of changes made.

**Type of change**
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring

**Changes Made**
- [ ] Updated HTML content
- [ ] Modified CSS styles
- [ ] Enhanced JavaScript functionality
- [ ] Updated Azure Functions API
- [ ] Modified configuration files
- [ ] Updated documentation

**Testing**
- [ ] Tested locally with SWA CLI
- [ ] Verified responsive design on mobile/tablet
- [ ] Tested contact form functionality
- [ ] Checked SEO meta tags
- [ ] Validated HTML markup
- [ ] Tested accessibility features
- [ ] Verified performance (Lighthouse scores)

**Checklist**
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Code is commented where necessary
- [ ] Changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] Tests pass locally
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed

**Screenshots** (if applicable)
Add screenshots to demonstrate visual changes.

**Additional Notes**
Any additional information relevant to this PR.
